article.text: Mubarak, 84 and ailing, is being held in a military hospital on the outskirts of Cairo where he awaits the verdict of his murder trial on June 2 over the deaths of protesters during the uprising. See our editors' choices of the most eye-catching ... Egypt looks set for a run-off presidential vote between... Action from the red carpet at the 65th Cannes Film...
